name: Dragon Ball Super: Resurrection Game
description:
The greatest dream of every Dragon Ball fan is getting to live in the Dragon Ball universe and fight alongside Goku and his friends. One particular fan is in for a “rude” awakening when he suddenly dies and gets resurrected as a fusion character that never got to be seen!

The game is a turn-based RPG that adapts events from the "23rd Tenkaichi Budokai" story arc and beyond while adding a new and refreshing story and twists.

Why relive a story when you can make your own?

Follow Yamatori Araki as he mysteriously resurrects in Dragon Ball with the body of Gokhan, a fusion character that never got to be. Train with the best to unleash the potential hidden within this body, while the forces of evil use Beerus reincarnation game as an excuse to plot against the strongest in all of reality.

DBSRG has the Dragon Point System. The system allows the player to survive against enemies beyond the level cap by permanently boosting stats. Dragon Points are accrued after each level up.

Players gain skills and transformations by leveling up or training under specific masters.

Player can search for the Dragon Balls to make a wish.

Gameplay Legend

Z= Action/Enter

X= Back/Exit

Movement = Mouse+Left Click or Arrows.
